abstract: Harvard University announces title of 'house master,' used for generations to describe residential administrators, will be replaced by 'faculty dean'; term is considered anachronistic and was criticized by some for connoting slavery.

headline.print_headline: At Harvard Dorms, ‘House Masters’ No More
headline.main: At Harvard Dorms, ‘House Masters’ No More

snippet: The term to address residential administrators has come under fire for conjuring undertones of slavery.
lead_paragraph: The term to address residential administrators has come under fire for conjuring undertones of slavery.
